Uses of Package
org.shared.net.filter.ssl

  • Packages that use org.shared.net.filter.ssl 
    Package Description
    org.shared.net.filter.ssl
    A package for filter-based SSL/TLS transport.
    org.shared.test.net
    A suite of tests for asynchronous networking.
  • Classes in org.shared.net.filter.ssl used by org.shared.net.filter.ssl 
    Class and Description
    SslEngineFactory
    Defines a configurable factory for creating SSLEngines.
    SslEngineFactory.Mode
    An enumeration of SSLEngine operating modes.
    SslFilter
    An implementation of Filter that encrypts/decrypts traffic using the SSL/TLS protocol.
    SslFilterFactory
    An implementation of FilterFactory that creates SslFilters.
  • Classes in org.shared.net.filter.ssl used by org.shared.test.net 
    Class and Description
    SslFilterFactory
    An implementation of FilterFactory that creates SslFilters.
